step1.howItWorksInfo: Just upload your work schedule, select yourself and we'll generate events in google calendar for you.
step1.dragAndDropInfo: Drag and drop or click to select your work schedule (.xlsx)
step1.dragAndDropChangeInfo: Drag and drop or click to change your work schedule (.xlsx)
step1.beerLicenseInfo: This app is licensed under the Beerware license :) If you like this app, you can buy me a beer in return.

step3.info: If everything is ok, you can download your callendar now. Just click on the button below ;)
step3.importToCalendarStep2: 2. Select the downloaded file and your calendar to which events will be added
step3.importToCalendarStep3: 3. Click 'Import' button and enjoy your calendar
step3.appleInfo: Notice: If you are using Apple calendar you can import your events to your calendar but I don't know how to do it :)
